knimeNode.name: Database Extract Table Dimension (Legacy)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node extracts the table dimension from a Database Query Connection

intro.p: This node extracts the table dimension from a Database Query Connection. Row count is obtained during node execution by running a 'SELECT count(*) FROM (...)' around the incoming SQL statement

This node was developed by Vernalis Research . For feedback and more information, please contact
knime@vernalis.com

ports.outPort: Table containing the database table dimensions both as rows in the output table and as flow variables
